channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Microsoft is reportedly about to layoff 3% of its workforce
item.description: Microsoft is about to trim its worldwide workforce by 3%, CNBC reports. The company had around 228,000 employees worldwide as of June, it says, meanin...

item.title: Sony Bravia Theater System 6 Review: Great Performance, Odd Design
item.description: Sony’s unexpected 5.1 surround system provides rip-roaring fun in an old-school design.

item.title: 8 Best Automatic Litter Boxes (2025), Tested and Reviewed
